text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC @realDonaldTrump - you’re a moron. @RoyCooperNC - you’re awesome! Thanks to YOU, Governor, North Carolinians aren’t getting exposed to COVID-19 because of an egomaniac (that’s you, Trump.)
